creator: hejral@magicseven.cz
text:
Created attachment 16476
this SVG is 320pixel wide !!! But not in Squiggle

<svg width="320px" viewBox="0 0 800 640"
     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" version="1.1">

This works for me with Squiggle.
It is worth noting that Squiggle will not allow the canvas
to shrink below the width of the tool-bar.  AFAIK this is
conformant behavior as the width and height are a request
to the UA and may be ignored if there is a reason
(for example the width and height on an SVG are ignored
when referenced from an image element).
creator: deweese@apache.org
